Technologies.Name: Persian Architecture
Technologies.History: The persians built the wonderful 2700 kilometer-long Royal Highway from Sardis to Susa; Darius the Great and Xerxes also built the magnificent parthepolis; Cyrus the Great greatly improved Ecbatana and virtually 'rebuilt' the old Elamite capital of Susa.
Technologies.Description: Parthian buildings +25% health and capture points for structures, but +20% build time.

Technologies.Name: Nisean War Horses
Technologies.History: The beautiful and powerful breed of Nisean horses increases health for parthian cavalry.

Heroes.Name: Arsaces I
Heroes.History: The founder of the Parthian empire.

Heroes.Name: Surena
Heroes.History: The Parthian general who defeated Crassus at the battle of Carrhae, inflicting one of the worst defeats the Romans had ever experienced.

CivBonuses.Name: Skilled Archers
CivBonuses.History: The Parthians were some of the most skilled archers in the world.

TeamBonuses.Name: Silk Road
TeamBonuses.Description: Higher income (+15%) from land trade routes for ally's traders.

Structures.Name: Apadana
Structures.History: The term Apadana designates a large hypostyle palace found in parthia. The best known example, and by far the largest, was the great Apadana at parthepolis. Functioning as the empire's central audience hall, the palace is famous for the reliefs of the tribute-bearers and of the army, including the Immortals.
